mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_SELLER, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, P.PROD_STOCK, P.PROD_DESC, P.PROD_CODE, P.PROD_REG, P.PROD_UPD, I.IMG_PATH AS PROD_IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT_DB P LEFT JOIN IMAGE_DB I ON P.PROD_ID = I.IMG_PROD_ID AND I.IS_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE P.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_SELLER, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_STOCK, PROD_DESC, PROD_CODE, PROD_REG, PROD_UPD FROM PRODUCT_DB ORDER BY PROD_ID DESC

SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_SELLER, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, P.PROD_STOCK, P.PROD_DESC, P.PROD_CODE, P.PROD_REG, P.PROD_UPD, I.IMG_PATH AS PROD_IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT_DB P LEFT JOIN IMAGE_DB I ON P.PROD_ID = I.IMG_PROD_ID AND I.IS_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE P.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_DB ( PROD_ID, PROD_SELLER, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_STOCK,PROD_DESC, PROD_CODE, PROD_REG ) VALUES ( #{prodId}, #{prodSeller, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName}, #{prodPrice}, #{prodStock}, #{prodDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ_PROD_CODE.NEXTVAL, NVL(#{prodReg, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYSDATE) )
mapper.select: SELECT PROD_CODE FROM PRODUCT_DB WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_DB SET PROD_NAME = #{prodName}, PROD_PRICE = #{prodPrice}, PROD_STOCK = #{prodStock}, PROD_DESC = #{prodDesc}, PROD_UPD = SYSDATE WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, I.IMG_PATH AS PROD_IMG_PATH, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM PRODUCT_DB P JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_DB PC ON P.PROD_ID = PC.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN IMAGE_DB I ON P.PROD_ID = I.IMG_PROD_ID AND I.IS_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE PC.CAT_ID = #{catId} ORDER BY P.PROD_REG DESC ) WHERE RNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, I.IMG_PATH AS PROD_IMG_PATH, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM PRODUCT_DB P JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_DB PC ON P.PROD_ID = PC.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN IMAGE_DB I ON P.PROD_ID = I.IMG_PROD_ID AND I.IS_MAIN = 'Y' WHERE PC.CAT_ID = #{catId} ORDER BY P.PROD_REG DESC )

SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_SELLER, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, P.PROD_STOCK, P.PROD_DESC, P.PROD_CODE, P.PROD_REG, P.PROD_UPD, I.IMG_PATH AS PROD_IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT_DB P LEFT JOIN IMAGE_DB I ON P.PROD_ID = I.IMG_PROD_ID AND I.IS_MAIN = 'Y'
AND (P.PROD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PROD_DESC LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND P.PROD_PRICE >= #{minPrice}
AND P.PROD_PRICE <= #{maxPrice}
AND P.PROD_ID IN (SELECT PROD_ID FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY_DB WHERE CAT_ID = #{category})
ORDER BY
P.PROD_NAME P.PROD_PRICE P.PROD_REG P.PROD_ID
DESC ASC
ORDER BY P.PROD_ID DESC
